entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Mont-Tremblant
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or freezing rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening then changing to freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
